title: Flamer
contents: Incendiary "Flamer" weapons are effective against infantry and weaker propulsion tanks.
Flamer weapons are also excellent against bunkers and scavenger structures, but weaker against other structures.
Flamers can "penetrate" units, damaging and possibly igniting multiple units in a single burst, thus making Flamer weapons excellent crowd-killers.
However, due to their short attack ranges, Flamer weapons can be risky to use.
